Workflow.Name: Admin | Capacity Alerts
Workflow.Description: This flow checks actual capacity consumption and compares it with approved capacity, that an admin sets. The flow will send an alert to the admin for environments that exceed the approved capacity, or are at 80% of approved capacity.

Description.description: This flow checks actual capacity consumption and compares it with approved capacity, that an admin sets. The flow will send an alert to the admin for environments that exceed the approved capacity, or are at 80% of approved capacity.
